ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: You should have been given a newbie weapon that you can use when you first created your char. also if you go to the guy you turned in your tattered note thingy
ygData.messageBody:
You should have been given a newbie weapon that you can use when you first
created your char. also if you go to the guy you turned in your tattered
note thingy to you should also be able to at least put 1 of those training
points in hand 2 hand


----- Original Message -----
From: <edward001@...>



>
> Ok. I have a minor healing spell and a spell that raises hit points.
> I have a shaman so I can't use my club. I tried to equip it with no
> success. I have no money. No one wants to buy mushrooms (must be a
> drug free town). I think that I need to somehow come up with some
> money so that I can buy a scroll with a spell that can do damage. I
> don't seem to be able to kill anything bare handed. I just keep
> getting killed. Does anybody have any suggestions?
>
> I could delete the character, start over, maybe sell one or both of
> my spell scrolls and buy an attack spell scroll. But do I really
> need to? Is there still hope for my character?
> >
> Edward
>
